name: shouldResetCartAndUIStateWithResetAppState()
description: Validates that clicking on 'Reset App State' button on the sidebar results in emptying the cart and resetting the state of 'Add to Cart' buttons on the Products Page assigned to the items that were previously added to the cart.
descriptionHtml: Validates that clicking on 'Reset App State' button on the sidebar results in emptying the cart and resetting the state of 'Add to Cart' buttons on the Products Page assigned to the items that were previously added to the cart.

labels.name: story
labels.value: User clicks on 'Reset App State' button on the sidebar when the cart is not empty, which empties the cart.
